snippet: The company announced the final part of a 2.3 billion euro ($2.6 billion) expansion of its operations in Spain, in what it called the biggest investment ever in the country’s auto industry.
abstract: Ford Motor announces last part of 2.3 billion euro, or $2.6 billion, extension of its Spanish operations.
lead_paragraph: The company announced the final part of a 2.3 billion euro ($2.6 billion) expansion of its operations in Spain, in what it called the biggest investment ever in the country’s auto industry.

headline.main: Ford Expands Operations in Spain for Export Business
headline.print_headline: Ford Expands Operations in Spain for Export Business
